Lightweight Delphi FMX Grid.

Read only.

Support headers, merged cells and styles.

![alt text](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/22379027/547263203-0c72a2a8-9a1b-4f5d-8b07-f4065da85c08.jpg?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..j-oVdaA9QBXxVGNTvagerYNsx19kh_gmMhq3BuaAJ1E)

TMultiHeaderGrid - does not store cell texts or styles. Use events to populate.

TMultiHeaderStringGrid - stores cell texts and styles internally.

Usage examples in Test folder.
